property.name: content
property.description: This is the freemarker template for dashboard file
property.value:
apiVersion: 1
providers: <#list dashboards as db> - name: '${db.name}' orgId: 1 folder: '${db.folder}' type: file options: path: '${db.path}' </#list>

property.name: bm_agent_dashboard
property.description: This is the dashboard configuration file for BM agent
